songs.title: Desi Put Javaan
songs.lyrics:
Meri gandi aadatan toh duniya tang
Ek adhe sutte naal menu chade phark
Mere haan de, naiyo mainu pehcande
Bohemia nu ni jande
Ek vaari dasya main baari baari dasna
Bohemia mera naam, mera basna
Mere te jale v, kakh mere palle te
Mainu kitti parwah
Aaye kinae khiladi, keda
Mere val ega mainu khoj ke dikhao
Main rozz peene bhang menu rok ke dikhao
Vadeya to sikheya mainu tok ke dikhao
Nawa - nawa jamana mainu rok ke dikhao

Jithe vi 4 desi utthe panchait
Suno mainu Punjabi vich karde rap
Hoon kudiya te aan de jaan
Chhad gallan battan, main ek raat da mehmaan
Mukhda sona tera chunri de nicche
Naale Nakhre hazaar
Akhiyan mere to milde billo
Dasaa main tenu sacchi gal ek dillon
Ajj raat main gujaarni teri choli te piche

Desi putt jawan mere geet bajan
Variyan nu rajdi awaaz di pehcaan
Munde jadon mere geet bajan
Bass di awaaz naal loka nu daran
Desi putt jawan mere geet bajan
Variyan nu rajdi awaaz di pehcaan
Munde jadon mere geet bajan
Bass di awaaz naal loka nu daraa
Bass di awaaz naal loka nu daraa
Yeah!

Meri pehli CD vich pardeshaan de
Sira de utho langh gayi lokan de
Jinyena ne duji CD samajh ni aayi
Meri tijji CD sun aap dende gawahi

Mainu ni chande khinde saare kalakar mainu
Mainu sunan vich lage saare de saare bekar mainu
Ni tainu hor kucch ni aanda
Pyon de jamane da gaana hun tu gana hai
Thodi sharam khao
Nawaan ve daur nawe daur vich nawe daud
Nawi daud dodo te nawi cheeja banao
Nawi cheeja suno te nawi cheeza sunao
Meri nawi CD waare jaake logaan nu batao

Mainu ni chande kinne saare kalakar mainu
Mainu sunan vich lage saare de saare bekar mainu
Vi tainu hor kucch ni aanda
Pyon de zamane da gaana hun tu gana aain
Thodi sharam khao
Navaa ve daur nave daur chi nave daud
Navi daud dodo te navi cheezaa banao
Navi cheezaa suno te navi cheezaa bajao
Meri navi CD waare jaake logaan nu batao

Javaan mere geet bajan
Variyan nu meri awaaz di pehcaan
Munde jadon mere geet bajan
Desi putt jawan mere geet bajan
Variyan nu meri awaaz di pehcaan
Munde jadon mere geet bajan
Bass di awaaz naal loka nu daran
Bass di awaaz naal loka nu daran...
